title: Mark of Memories
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>School has started, huh~. Aaaah, it would’ve been nice if we had 1 more month of summer vacation.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, that’s right. I wanted to play more with everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, hey hey, how burnt did you get at the pool we went to the other day? For me.... look, it’s this much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Waaah, that’s crazy! How about me? Take a look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uwaaah! You got a pretty striking burn, Ayumu-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Oh yeah! The one on my foot is even worse. Look, the sandal shape is so apparent!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahahaha! That’s amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Right? But, these marks are there as proof that we had fun, so I’ll be a bit sad when they fade away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You’re right. Whenever we see these, they remind us of the fun times, huh.... Alright, Ayumu-chan! Let’s go make other memories besides these sunburns! We have Silver Week this month, after all~. Let’s have fun with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Agreed! I’ll go contact the others!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
